content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: light_blue_stained_glass
inventory=[{"type": "blue_orchid", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "birch_sapling", "quantity": 59, "index": 28}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 8, "index": 36}, {"type": "purpur_pillar", "quantity": 41, "index": 37}, {"type": "yellow_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "grass_path", "quantity": 43, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft light_blue_stained_glass, I need to craft light_blue_dye, which requires a blue_orchid, which is currently at slot 23. I will move it to slot 1 in order to craft the dye.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok

Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1
